title: Senior Integration Engineer
description:
At Heart Aerospace, we are developing the ES-30, a regional hybrid-electric airplane capable of carrying 30 passengers, boasting an electric zero-emission range of 200 km and an extended hybrid range of 800 km. Heart is targeting type certification of the ES-30 by the end of the decade.


We are expanding our R&D hub in Los Angeles, where we are advancing Heart’s hybrid-electric propulsion system and other key technologies.


**Your mission**



We are seeking a highly motivated Senior Integration Engineer to join our Mechanisms team. You will play a crucial role in the system-level design, bring up, debugging, and certification of distributed systems across the ES-30 aircraft. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and certify the first commercial electric-hybrid aircraft.  

  



**Key responsibilities include but are not limited to:**


* Lead the design of essential systems by collaborating cross-functionally with flight science, software, electrical, mechanical, and safety engineers.
* Lead in-vehicle debugging, troubleshooting, and root cause analysis of system-level issues, across electrical, mechanical and software systems. Work across multiple teams to find and efficient solution.
* Support bring-up and maintenance of prototype aircraft, integration test benches, Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) environments, and virtual simulation platforms.
* Create and execute system-level integration plans for a complete system or subsystem.
* Contribute to the software verification and validation strategy in accordance with DO-178C objectives.


**Skills & Requirements**
-------------------------

**You'll Bring These Qualifications:**


* 3+ years of experience in system integration, ideally in the aerospace or automotive domain.
* Strong understanding of real-time operating systems (RTOS), communication protocols (Ethernet, CAN, LIN, …), and system-level integration practices.
* Proficiency in Rust, C/C++, or Python for automation and testing.
* Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git), CI/CD pipelines, and integration frameworks.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.


**These Qualifications Would Be Nice to Have:**


* Experience with DO-178C, DO-254, DO-160G, DO-331, or other safety-critical standards.
* Passion for aircraft and electrification of the aviation industry


**Education**


* Bachelor's or master's degree in electrical engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, Aerospace Engineering, or related field.
Heart Aerospace has a clear mission. We work to decarbonize and democratize air travel. We believe in electrification. Not only to bring down emissions and build a sustainable future, but to make flying accessible for the many, around the world.



Electric planes are cheaper to operate and can unlock convenient and effective regional traveling, a market that today is restricted by the difficulty of making a sustainable profit. Our mission is about taking electrification to the skies, helping our customers build their businesses, and the traveling public to access an amazing and sustainable service.



Working at Heart Aerospace is not just a career; it is a chance to directly make the world more accessible and sustainable. Come help us write a new chapter in the history of aviation together!



We seek experienced and skilled professionals to join our fast-moving team developing a new electric aircraft. We’re in a very expansive phase and now is the time to join our team! Visit our **career site** and check out what it is like working at Heart.


*Heart Aerospace is committed to equal employment opportunity and providing reasonable accommodations to qualified candidates and employees pursuant to applicable law. We value and encourage diversity and solicit applications from all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, gender, sex, age, religion, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, medical condition, gender identity or expression, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law.*



Heart Aerospace participates in E-Verify.

title: Cost Engineer
description:
**Job description**

Cespira is a joint venture between Volvo Group and Westport Fuel Systems, dedicated to advancing sustainable transportation solutions. With offices in Gothenburg (Sweden), Vancouver (Canada), and Brescia (Italy), Cespira is leading the way in developing and commercializing High-Pressure Direct Injection (HPDI) technology for heavy-duty engines. This innovative technology supports the use of hydrogen and renewable fuels, significantly reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Our mission is to provide practical, scalable solutions that accelerate the transition to a decarbonized future, ensuring cleaner air and a better world for future generations. We are committed to building on our strong reputation for excellence and pushing the boundaries of what's possible in transportation.  

The **Cost Engineer** plays a critical role in driving the business case for HPDI components within Cespira by supporting both cost reduction initiatives and pricing strategies. This hybrid role is responsible for analyzing product costs, driving cost management and reduction, and aligning those efforts with competitive pricing strategies to optimize the profitability and competitiveness of our HPDI products.

  

The Product Cost Engineer responsibilities include completing techno-economic analysis that considers the impact of automated production equipment, supply chain availability/localization/impacts, operational overhead, operational strategy, material choice, cleanliness levels, manufacturability in different processes and component design to validate business cases for new products and capital investments. The ideal candidate will possess a proven history of managing product cost in a design, engineering and manufacturing environment. The role requires a robust analytical skill set and proficiency with cost management tools. Candidates should also possess the ability to address a multitude of administrative support needs promptly and professionally.

**Job requirements**

**Position Requirements**

* Bachelor’s degree required in engineering or other related field of study
* 5+ years of experience in cost engineering, pricing analysis, or a related field, ideally within a manufacturing or automotive environment. Experience with automotive powertrain components technology or alternative fuel systems components is a plus.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively with various stakeholders
* Strong analytical skills with proficiency in cost management tools and pricing analysis.
* Advanced Excel skills; familiarity with cost modeling software is an asset.
* Demonstrated ability to develop and implement cost reduction strategies.
* Excellent verbal and written skills, with the ability to present complex data in a clear, concise manner.
* Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and capable of working independently in a fast-paced environment.
**Job responsibilities**

**Position Responsibilities**

*Cost engineering*

* Conduct detailed cost analysis on HPDI components, including material costs, production processes, and supply chain impacts.(Both for components from suppliers but also inhouse manufacturing in Italy).
* Develop and maintain baseline cost models and "should-cost" estimates for current and future products.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop cost reduction initiatives, focusing on optimizing manufacturing processes and material sourcing.
* Analyze the techno-economic impact of automated production equipment, operational overhead, and component design on overall product costs.
* Drive continuous improvement in cost management through data-driven insights and cost forecasting.
* Develop strategies and plans in order to achieve cost reduction targets including collaborating with internal stakeholders on product costing roadmap
* Actively take part in PDP (Product Development Process) and advise on manufacturing processes, design choices, material etc. in order to optimize cost

*Price Analysis*

* Identify trends and developments in competitive environments and present on findings
* Assess and analyze competitive pricing trends in the alternative fuel systems and heavy-duty vehicle industries.
* Develop pricing models for HPDI components based on comprehensive cost analysis and market trends.
* Provide input into the pricing strategy, ensuring alignment with overall business objectives and cost structures.
* Present findings on pricing trends and cost impacts to senior leadership, and customer supporting decision-making on product pricing.
* Customer interface when it comes to should cost analysis
* Support the financial planning and budgeting processes through accurate cost forecasting

*Collaborative and* *supporting*

* Assist various departments in understanding the cost conditions impacting product pricing, providing transparency across the organization.
* Present findings on pricing trends and cost impacts to senior leadership, supporting decision-making on product pricing.
* Provide training and guidance to internal stakeholders on cost management practices and pricing strategies
* Support business cases for new products and capital investments by validating cost and pricing assumptions.

title: Backend Engineer
description:
Have you been coding for a few years and now want to use your superpowers to change how people manage their finances? Do you thrive in a modern tech environment where you can experiment, build, and create solutions that make a real impact? If so, it might be time to join
 **Lendo** 
 !🚀
   

  

**The team**
 You’ll become part of an open-minded, agile, and cross-functional team that loves to solve problems and innovate! At Lendo, everyone can have an impact. Our tech teams work closely with the business, directly contributing to continuously improving the tech and our product offerings. Through our products, we want to empower people to make smarter and more conscious financial decisions.
   

  

**A Look At What You Would Do**
* Use modern tech such as Kubernetes, Docker, PostgreSQL, GCP, CI/CD…
* Build, design, and optimise Go microservices
* Continuously create exciting new products and features, collaborating closely with colleagues
* Write tests at different levels to ensure quality and that your code really does what you want
* Identify and keep track of metrics that tell you how our software is performing
* Be creative and brainstorm ideas for ways we can further improve
* Bring your own unique skill set to the table
* You’ll experiment, test, try, fail and learn all the time

title: Full-Stack Engineer (JavaScript)
description:
At Proposales, we're on a mission to shape the future of business proposals, replacing static documents by defining a new online standard fully powered by web technology (literally, a piece of internet infrastructure).
 



  





 Read about our mission:
 
 https://mission.proposales.com
 




 (this page is created from scratch by Peter, Design Engineer)
 



  





 We're looking for a truly gifted Full-Stack Engineer to join our Product team. This is a unique opportunity to bring your passion and ideas to a fast-growing tech company, to further develop the limitless possibilities of the Proposales’ platform.
 



  





**You will form a "Duo" together with an extraordinary product designer, and together you will be responsible from the initial shaping (of how to design/build something new) to deploying it to Production.** 
 We are inspired by the "
 
 Shape up
 
 " process from 37signals.
 



  





 Joining a company early is exciting, not only will you be part of defining the vision, as one of our first employees, you will receive a competitive package, including a stock option program, personal training budget, and much more.
 



  





**Your mission:** 



* Write testable, maintainable and scalable code and always with a quality mindset
* Continuously optimise and iterate on your ideas and solutions, and always strive for even better performance and user experience
* Be ready to embrace new technologies and paradigms as we move Proposales into a serverless era
* Join us in shaping our engineering culture to make Proposales a place you look forward to in the morning



  





**What we believe in:** 




 We use a serverless, continuous-delivery infrastructure hosted on Vercel, built using Next.js and written in TypeScript.
 



  





 When deciding on a tech stack for a new sub-project, we usually take the opportunity to assess new tech early and plan for long-term benefits and maintainability over short-term goals. But we also value simple solutions over smart ones, and embrace test-driven development and pair programming, favoring higher code quality over faster development times.
 



  





 We generally prefer a functional programming style over object-orientation and like to avoid abstractions like middlewares or ORMs.
 



  





 We prefer monorepos with multiple smaller projects, instead of one monolithic application. We avoid code duplication by extracting core logic and UI into separate internal libraries.
 



  





**Some of the technologies you would be working with:** 



* Javascript
* React
* Node.js
* Next.js
* TypeScript
* PostgreSQL
* Vercel



  





**A bit about you:** 



* Strong coding ability in Javascript
* Experience with advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks
* Experience with API and product development
* You are great to collaborate with
* You believe in code quality through code reviews, pair programming and test-driven development
* You believe in self-management and clear communication over processes
* Willingness to learn new technologies and move between different tech stacks
* Working proficiency and communication skills in verbal and written English
* Based in Stockholm and don't mind spending 3 days a week at the office with colleagues

title: Growth Engineer (Python & LLM)
description:
We’re redefining what marketing looks like for tech startups. Forget traditional marketers—we’re looking for two creative engineers who love Python, LLMs, automation, and growth hacking.
 



  





**Your Mission:** 




**Build automated marketing solutions directly on the Triform platform, leveraging Python and cutting-edge AI to grow our user base, engage our community, and make Triform the #1 choice for AI workflows.** 




  





**Who You Are:** 




  




* You’re an experienced Python developer who loves experimenting with APIs and frameworks like LangChain and OpenAI.
* You understand growth-hacking, A/B testing, funnels, and social media automation.
* You’re comfortable engaging with developers on platforms like GitHub, Discord, Reddit, X, LinkedIn, and YouTube.
* You’re excited about building your own tools and seeing your code directly impact our growth.



  





**What You’ll Do:** 




  




* Automate our social media presence using LLM-driven workflows.
* Create content-generating AI scripts, experimentation frameworks, and marketing automation directly within Triform.
* Monitor, analyze, and optimize engagement metrics.
* Build meaningful relationships within developer communities, championing open-source collaboration.



  





**Why Join Triform?** 




  




* **Equal Pay and Substantial Ownership:** 
 Everyone earns the same salary, from engineers to management. You’ll have genuine equity and a voice.
* **European Data Sovereignty:** 
 We’re committed to providing Europe with AI and data infrastructure that’s truly democratic and safe.
* **Meaningful Work:** 
 You’re shaping a future where AI is open, transparent, and accessible for everyone—not just the tech giants.



  





**Come join a pioneering team of engineers reinventing marketing from the ground up.** 




  





**Ready to join?** 



* **Send us your GitHub profile, some examples of your marketing hacks or automation projects, and a short note on why this role excites you.**

title: Data Engineer
description:
We are looking for an ambitious Data Engineer to join our talented and growing Global IT Data team at Embla Medical, the parent company of Össur. The Data Engineer will be involved in developing and building access to data that supports informed and data-driven decision-making across the organization.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Participation in development and operations of data warehouse solutions
* Design and development of a data platform
* Processing and handling data from different systems



  





**Qualifications** 



* Interpersonal and teamwork skills
* Initiative and independent working methods
* University degree or experience that is applicable to the job
* Good knowledge and experience in database programming (SQL)
* Experience of using Databricks and Azure Data Factory is a plus
* Knowledge in Python is a plus



  





 We offer flexible working hours and possibilities for remote working.
 



 The position can be located in Iceland, Sweden or in Poland.
 



 We encourage people to apply for the position regardless of gender or origin.
 



  





 Application period ends on June 8th, 2025

title: Senior Frontend Engineer - Plugins
company_industry: Musicians and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us— and let the world feel your work.** 




  





 We are looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer to join our Third Party Experience team, part of a product area called Soundtrack. Our mission is to revolutionize how creators integrate music and soundtracking features into their workflows, providing seamless access to our services directly inside major video and music editing tools.
 



  





**Job Summary** 




 As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you'll be responsible for developing and embedding Epidemic Sound’s music, sound effects, and AI-powered soundtracking features into third-party applications. Collaborating with peers from across the organization, you’ll play a pivotal role in making our tools easily accessible to content creators right where they need them the most - within their video editing platforms. Our user base spans from commercial content creators working for big enterprise customers, TV production companies, PR agencies to influencers editing their own content prior to publishing on social media platforms.
 



 We’re looking for a team player who thrives in a dynamic environment and enjoys collaborating across different roles and disciplines. You take initiative, aren’t afraid to step up when needed, and are just as comfortable leading as you are supporting the success of your teammates.
 



 This role is focused on frontend/plugin development, so experience building plugins or working with integrations in video or music editors is highly beneficial. The environment we work in is complex, and we are looking for someone who is looking for a role beyond regular web development.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 



* Collaborate with designers, product managers, and cross-functional teams to build and integrate soundtracking features into popular video and music editing tools.
* Develop scalable and maintainable frontend solutions that can be reused across multiple plugins for video editing platforms as well as in desktop applications.
* Optimize the performance and usability of our plugins to ensure a seamless user experience in third-party environments.
* Contribute to architectural decisions and ensure code quality through best practices and modular, reusable design.
* Actively participate in shaping the strategic direction of the team as we expand our presence in major editing tools.



  





**Requirements** 



* Extensive experience with React, React-Query, Typescript, HTML, and CSS.
* Strong focus on building modular, reusable code and scalable frontend systems.
* A systems-thinking approach to problem-solving and architecture.
* Experience working collaboratively with design, product, and engineering teams.



  





 It would also be music to our ears if you have:
 


* Knowledge of or experience with technologies like GraphQL, Electron, desktop apps, Vite, compilers/bundlers, monorepos, feature flags, CI/CD, and Redux.
* Previous experience developing plugins or integrations for video/music editing software.



  





**Equal opportunity employer** 




 We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.
 



  





**Application** 




 Ready to make the world feel your work? Apply now by clicking the link below! We embrace a hybrid model but love collaborating in person, so we spend the majority of our time in the office.

title: Windows/VMware konsult
description:
Akkodis söker Senior Engineer – Windows & VMware till uppdrag inom privat molnplattform
 



  





**Om uppdraget** 




 Akkodis söker nu en erfaren och självgående Senior Engineer med djup kompetens inom Windows-miljöer och VMware till ett uppdrag med fokus på drift och förvaltning av en privat molnplattform.
 



  





 Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i den dagliga tekniska driften av plattformen, där höga krav ställs på säkerhet, tillgänglighet och regelefterlevnad. Uppdraget är placerat på plats i Solna och/eller Forsmark, vilket innebär att vi söker dig som trivs i en fysisk arbetsmiljö och uppskattar att vara nära systemen du arbetar med.
 



  





 Vi söker dig som har:
 


* Flerårig erfarenhet av tekniskt arbete i större Windows-baserade miljöer
* Djup kompetens inom VMware (vSphere, ESXi, vCenter)
* God förståelse för drift av privata molnmiljöer
* Förmåga att arbeta med höga säkerhetskrav och förståelse för juridiska/regulatoriska krav
* Erfarenhet av systemförvaltning, felsökning och dokumentation
* Förmåga att arbeta strukturerat och självständigt i komplexa IT-miljöer



  





 Meriterande erfarenheter:
 


* Erfarenhet från verksamheter med höga krav på informationssäkerhet
* Kunskap om backup-lösningar, automatisering och övervakningsverktyg
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta enligt ITIL-processer



  





**Viktigt att veta:** 



* Uppdraget kräver svenskt medborgarskap
* Säkerhetsprövning och bakgrundskontroll genomförs före uppdragsstart
* Arbetet sker på plats – ingen möjlighet till distansarbete
* Resor mellan Solna och Forsmark kan förekomma



  





**Om Akkodis** 




 Akkodis är en global ledare inom IT- och teknikkonsulttjänster. Vi kombinerar teknisk expertis med djup branschkunskap för att hjälpa våra kunder att möta morgondagens utmaningar. Hos oss får du möjlighet att utvecklas i spännande uppdrag tillsammans med några av Sveriges mest erfarna teknikkonsulter.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder ett tryggt och engagerande konsultliv, där din kompetens och din framtid står i fokus.
 



 Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt – urval sker löpande!
 



  





 Välkommen till Akkodis – där teknik möter mänsklig potential.

title: Integrations Engineer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches as well as Swedish style snus online. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 250 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 We are seeking a talented and experienced Integrations Specialist to join our small and highly skilled team. Being a part of our team offers you the freedom and trust to take your own initiatives and plan your work accordingly. We believe in empowering our team members to make decisions and take ownership of their projects. This autonomy allows you to explore innovative solutions and contribute to the success of our organization in a meaningful way. You will have the opportunity to work in a supportive environment where your ideas are valued, and you can grow both personally and professionally. You will have the opportunity to work in a company and with a high volume integration platform handling millions of Ecom transactions on a yearly basis, in several countries and across 2 continents.
   

  

**Key responsibilities:**
* Design, develop, and implement complex integration solutions using a Cloud Based Integration Platform (C# based framework)
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and analyze integration requirements.
* Plan, develop, implement and maintain system integrations (For example Ecom/WMS/ERP).
* Document integration processes and provide technical guidance to internal stakeholders.
* As a part of a highly skilled and dedicated team, be involved in improving processes and way of working.
* Be part of ensuring the scalability, stability, long-term development and planning of a modern integration platform.


**What We Want From You**
 We’re looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, people-first environment and is excited to build great stuff. Here’s what will help you succeed:
   

  

* Solid experience in developing and implementing complex integration solutions.
* Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills.
* Solid programming skills.


**Nice to have**
* Proficiency in C#.
* Experience working with the cloud-based integrations systems.
* Experience with integrations towards ERP, WMS, and Ecom systems.
* Proficiency with SQL databases.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *Inclusion & Non-Hierarchy* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Amanda Ainali at amanda.ainali@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 100 000 consumers.

title: Data Scientist/Data Engineer
description:
SICS, Superintelligence Computing Systems, är ett banbrytande deeptech AI-startup som grundades 2022 av entreprenörerna bakom MySQL och JRockit. De ligger i framkant inom utvecklingen av AGI och skapar en universell AI-robothjärna för att automatisera olika typer av robotar och industriella processer. Tekniken används redan i kommersiell drift hos Nowaste Logistics, där SICS robothjärna hanterar komplexa miljöer som tidigare krävde manuellt arbete. SICS är ett växande team av högprofilerade medarbetare och har nyligen fått stöd från Europeiska innovationsrådet EIC.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 I rollen som Data Scientist/Data Engineer kommer du att hantera och forma stora mängder data, med fokus på bild- och sensordata från automation och robotik. Du kommer att designa och utveckla avancerade data-pipelines och säkerställa att data är tillgänglig, kvalitativ och redo för vidare analys. Rollen innebär även utveckling av prediktiva modeller och algoritmer, samt att bidra till att bolaget och kollegorna får ut maximal nytta av data. Du rapporterar till CTO och arbetar tvärfunktionellt i ett högkvalificerat team.
 



  





**Dina ansvarsområden inkluderar:** 



* Design och implementering av datainfrastruktur och pipelines
* Utveckling av system för datainsamling och integration från flera källor
* Säkerställa datakvalitet och integritet genom validering och bearbetning
* Dataanalys och utveckling av prediktiva modeller och algoritmer
* Skapa visualiseringar och rapporter för att kommunicera insikter
* Samarbeta och bidra till tvärfunktionella team
* Hålla dig uppdaterad kring de senaste teknikerna inom data science och data engineering



  





**Bakgrund och erfarenhet:** 



* Mycket god kunskap i att samla in, rensa och analysera stora multimodala datamängder
* Djup kunskap om statistik, erfarenhet av SQL och datamodellering
* Erfarenhet av datainfrastruktur och databashantering
* Gedigna kunskaper i programmering, främst Python
* Erfarenhet av att generera träningsdata via teleoperering och simulering (Mujuco, Nvidia Omniverse eller liknande)
* Förmåga att förklara komplexa dataresultat för icke-tekniska intressenter
* Erfarenhet från arbete i startup-miljöer under tillväxtfas
* Minst tre års yrkeserfarenhet i liknande roll
* Examen i datavetenskap, statistik, matematik eller närliggande område (masterexamen är meriterande)



  





**Personliga egenskaper:** 




 För att lyckas hos SICS bör du vara analytisk, nyfiken och lösningsorienterad, och trivas med att arbeta både självständigt och i team. Du har lätt för att samarbeta tvärfunktionellt, kommunicerar tydligt och är bekväm med att fatta egna beslut. Din förmåga att anpassa dig till nya utmaningar i en innovativ och snabbföränderlig miljö är avgörande, och du har både kreativitet och teknisk nyfikenhet att driva utvecklingen framåt. Hos SICS värdesätts mångfald, nyfikenhet och förmåga att bidra med nya perspektiv för att tillsammans ta teknologin till nästa nivå.
 



  





 Läs mer på
 
 https://sics.ai/
 




  





**Låter det intressant? Välkommen med din ansökan!** 




 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Charlotta Skogar på charlotta.skogar@novare.se eller 0761-66 48 78. Urval sker löpande så vi ser gärna din ansökan så snart som möjligt.

title: Network Tester
description:
We are looking for a proactive and analytical Senior Technical IT Tester with strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. The ideal candidate is adaptable, structured, and collaborative, ensuring high-quality project delivery.
 



 Advanced knowledge of UI/API testing, including validation of request/response handling, integration testing, and automation for service-level validation. Good expertise in network testing is an advantage.
 



 Highly skilled in efficiently identifying and resolving issues, with extensive experience in advanced testing methodologies for telecom environments and automation frameworks. A structured approach and quick learning ability are essential for effectively tackling tasks. A strong passion for both manual and automated testing, combined with a commitment to delivering high-quality work in a dynamic setting with continuous development and deployments. An adaptable work style allows for seamless collaboration within teams while also excelling independently. A proactive mindset, combined with a strong sense of responsibility, ensures efficient problem-solving and thorough task follow-up. Knowledge of coding or a technical background in the telecom industry is a valuable advantage.
 



 Key competencies include:
 


* **API testing** 
 – validation, automation, and integration testing.
* **Network testing** 
 – protocol verification, performance analysis, and troubleshooting.
* **Automation frameworks** 
 and scripting for efficient validation.
* **Troubleshooting & defect analysis** 
 to enhance system stability
* **CI/CD integration** 
 – ensuring automated testing (e.g. Jenkins) within continuous delivery pipelines
* **Strong mindset and attitude** 
 – proactive, analytical, and team-focused approach



 Proficient if the candidate is highly in line with the principles, methods, techniques and tools for the effective management of the testing process and the execution of tests throughout the lifecycle of development or integration projects.
 



**Job description:** 




 ·        Review and analyze system specifications.
 



 ·        Design test procedures to evaluate each software product.
 



 ·        Design manual or automated test cases (Jira XRAY, JMeter), executing test cases/scripts (Jira, JMeter, SOAP UI) and analyzing results.
 



 ·        Report bugs and deviation to development teams (Jira/XRAY).
 



 ·        Using the software as intended to analyze its functional properties.
 



 ·        Implementing software evaluation test programs.
 



 ·        Finalizing, documenting and reporting the testing procedures & technical issues.
 



 ·        Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing.
 



 ·        Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development life cycle.
 



 You will work either independently or collaboratively with other technical specialists or developers. Your technical knowledge will be crucial in troubleshooting and resolving issues within our core delivery.

title: Sr. Solutions Engineer
description:
Our world is transforming, and PTC is leading the way. Our software brings the physical and digital worlds together, enabling companies to improve operations, create better products, and empower people in all aspects of their business.
   

  

 Our people make all the difference in our success. Today, we are a global team of nearly 7,000 and our main objective is to create opportunities for our team members to explore, learn, and grow – all while seeing their ideas come to life and celebrating the differences that make us who we are and the work we do possible.
   

  

 PTC’s ServiceMax is on a mission: enabling field service teams to keep the world running. A career at PTC’s ServiceMax means unleashing your potential to build, sell, implement and market award-winning products with a #wintogether and #customerobsessed approach. From MRI machines to gym equipment, customers around the globe rely on ServiceMax’s cloud-based software platform to keep these machines – and the world – running, every single day.
   

  

 We are looking for a Sr. Solution Engineer to join our tight-knit team of field service, CRM and cloud computing experts. We are innovative and competent, and we like to have fun working. We value creativity, passion, hard work, and of course winning. The Senior Solution Engineer (Pre-Sales) will establish a trusted advisor relationship with both our external prospects, customers, partners and internal technical teams. You will collaborate with internal product teams, the global Solution Engineering team and our commercial sales team in the Nordic region, to help drive sales of our enterprise-wide SaaS solution that will transform Field Service operations and increase productivity. In this role, you will be a strong voice for our customers, bringing technical and business requirements back to our product teams helping ensure our solutions continue to meet our customer’s needs.
   

  

 What You Will Do:
   

  

* Establish a deep understanding of our customers’ business and technical needs
* Create a “trusted technical advisor” relationship with our customer’s technologists and internal technical teammates
* Develop a solution architecture framework to support solution selling on an enterprise level. Help to provide vision, define system and application architecture, problem anticipation, and problem-solving ability across the landscape
* Lead change across large platforms / functional areas using technology solutions
* Provide software/hardware technical architecture expertise to ensure proper solution design
* Interface with all Pre-Sales Solutions Engineers globally (and build a community) to train, mentor, and guide through new solution architecture framework
* Provide coverage for key customer-facing events, particularly C-level discussions
* Build a link to a provocative selling model to ensure architecture views are properly integrated
* Shape, drive, and be held accountable for delivering significant strategic initiatives across broad scope/platform(s) in liaison with key stakeholders
* Help prospects and customers to realize the value of the solution you suggest. This is one of the most essential key responsibilities for this role


 What You Bring to ServiceMax:
   

  

* Bachelor's Degree in business, science, engineering, technology, or related discipline
* Strong work experience with at least 5 to 7 years in Software pre-sales
* Must be willing to travel 20%-40%


 Desired Characteristics:
   

  

* Significant expertise in developing and selling cloud-based solutions. Including creating and executing propositions and a track record of success
* Good understanding of cloud-based solutions with proven experience in selling Software as Service (SaaS) applications
* Strong presentation skills
* Experience with the salesforce.com platform
* Strong interpersonal skills, including creativity and curiosity, with ability to effectively communicate and influence solution direction to both technical and non-technical audiences alike across all organizational levels
* Technical acumen to interface with technologists, understand complex concepts and translate in a way that businesses or industries can understand
* Demonstrated problem-solving and creative skills, ability to exercise sound judgment and make decisions based on market and customer trends – go beyond the status quo
* Ability to deal with ambiguity, strategic agility, manage diversity and drive for results
* Strong English speaking and writing abilities
* Finally, one of the most critical aspects of this role – is being able to help understand the VALUE of what you are selling and articulate this for prospects and customers in a way they easily understand


 What ServiceMax Offers You:
   

  

* Highly competitive package
* Professional development and training opportunities


 Life at PTC is about more than working with today’s most cutting-edge technologies to transform the physical world. It’s about showing up as you are and working alongside some of today’s most talented industry leaders to transform the world around you.
   

  

 If you share our passion for problem-solving through innovation, you’ll likely become just as passionate about the PTC experience as we are. Are you ready to explore your next career move with us?
   

  

 We respect the privacy rights of individuals and are committed to handling Personal Information responsibly and in accordance with all applicable privacy and data protection laws. Review our Privacy Policy here."

title: Senior Fullstackutvecklare med fokus på backend
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY är ett ledande europeiskt företag med global räckvidd inom teknik, design och rådgivning. Vi accelererar omställningen mot ett hållbart samhälle.
   

  

 Vi är 19 000 hängivna experter inom industri, energi och digitalisering, som skapar hållbara lösningar för kommande generationer.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Är du en erfaren utvecklare med passion för backend och vill vara med och forma framtidens mobilitet? Just nu söker AFRY i Stockholm en
 **senior fullstackutvecklare** 
 till ett långsiktigt uppdrag inom fordonsbranschen.
   

  

 Om uppdraget:
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta i ett tekniskt avancerat projekt hos en ledande aktör inom fordonsindustrin. Uppdraget sträcker sig över
 **1 till 1,5 år** 
 , med start under hösten 2025. Här får du möjlighet att bidra med din expertis i ett team som värdesätter innovation, kvalitet och samarbete.
   

  

 Uppdraget innebär arbete med moderna tekniker och verktyg, där du får möjlighet att bidra med din expertis inom
 **AWS, Python, Java, SQL, GitLab och automatiserade tester** 
 . Ju mer senior du är, desto bättre – vi söker dig som kan ta ett stort ansvar och bidra till helheten.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* Djup kompetens inom Python och AWS
* Gärna erfarenhet av Java
* Kunskap inom SQL, GitLab och automatiserade tester
* Erfarenhet av både backend och gärna fullstackutveckling
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och ta ansvar i komplexa systemmiljöer
* Hög senioritet – vi söker dig med gedigen erfarenhet


 Vi erbjuder:
   

  

* Ett spännande och långsiktigt uppdrag i teknikens framkant
* Möjlighet att arbeta med några av branschens mest erfarna utvecklare
* En inkluderande och dynamisk arbetsmiljö hos AFRY


**Ytterligare information**
 Observera att
 **rekryteringsprocessen kan ta längre tid än vanligt på grund av den stundande sommarsemesterperioden** 
 .
   

  

 Uppdraget
 **kan komma att vara säkerhetsklassat** 
 , vilket innebär att kan omfattas av en
 **säkerhetsprövning** 
 . Därför är
 **svenskt medborgarskap och goda kunskaper i svenska språket ett krav** 
 .
   

  

 Låter det intressant? Tveka inte att höra av dig – vi ser fram emot att få veta mer om dig!
   

  

**Plats:** 
 Stockholm, Sverige
   

  

**Start:** 
 September 2025
   

  

**Placering:** 
 Stockholm
   

  

**Lön:** 
 Enligt överenskommelse
   

  

**Anställningsform:** 
 Heltid
   

  

**Kontaktperson för frågor:**
**Maja Lindqvist**
 Recruitment Partner
   

  

 maja.lindqvist@afry.com
   

  

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Forskningsingenjör med inriktning datorspel för kognitiv profilering
description:
**Psykologiska institutionen** 
 är en kreativ och internationell arbetsplats för utbildning och forskning med ca 200 anställda. Över 1000 personer studerar på våra olika utbildningar, på allt från grundnivå till forskarnivå, inklusive psykologprogram, psykoterapeutprogram och specialistutbildningar.
   

  

 Vi bedriver också mycket framgångsrik forskning inom flera områden, bland annat inom arbets- och organisationspsykologi, psykofysik och perception, stress, biologisk psykologi, klinisk psykologi, kognition, socialpsykologi och utvecklingspsykologi. Institutionen har en egen psykologisk klinik för forskning och utbildning med ca 4000 besök per år.
   

  

 Mer information om oss finns på: Psykologiska institutionen.
   

  

 Projektbeskrivning
   

  

 Psykologiska institutionen söker efter en forskningsingenjör som kan driva den tekniska utvecklingen inom följande forskningsprojekt: datorspel för kognitiv profilering och pedagogisk utveckling.
   

  

 Detta forskningsprojekt handlar om att utveckla datorspel för kognitiv profilering, pedagogisk utveckling och underhållning. Spelen individanpassas automatiskt och kan användas av barn och vuxna, med eller utan intellektuell funktionsnedsättning. Projektet är ett samarbete mellan Stockholms universitet, Karolinska institutet, Sahlgrenska akademin (Göteborgs universitet), Tillämpad IT (Göteborgs universitet).
   

  

* I ett av spelen rör sig spelaren i ett digitalt landskap i Unity och lär sig olika skolämnen, löser problem och gör utmaningar, ungefär som i en digital poängpromenad. En viktig kategori av utmaningar är att spela andra spel som är spel i spelet.
* I ett annat spel handlar det om att samla poäng genom att navigera i olika banor, som är digitala gestaltningar av Markov Decision Processes.
* I ett tredje spel rör sig spelaren i en gridvärld och löser olika problem som syftar till att överleva i spelet så länge som möjligt.


 Spelarnas beteende samlas in i psykologiska experiment med olika patientgrupper. Speldatan analyseras statistiskt för att hitta skillnader mellan olika patientgrupper och kontroller. Modeller som imiterar mänskligt beteende skapas, bland annat med hjälp av deep reinforcement learning och olika sökalgoritmer. Sökalgoritmerna kan ställas in för att spegla olika former av kognitiva begränsningar.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Som forskningsingenjör kommer du att arbeta fokuserat med forskning och publicering i nära samarbete med ett internationellt forskarlag. En central del av arbetet handlar om att utveckla spel och datormodeller baserade på AI. I projekten används maskininlärning baserad på Python och spelmotorn Unity med ML-Agents, samt olika webbutvecklingsverktyg.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har en kandidatexamen inom relevant område eller erfarenheter som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdiga. Du ska ha en akademisk bakgrund i datavetenskap med en mångårig professionell erfarenhet av att programmera för slutanvändare. Du ska ha gedigen erfarenhet av att programmera spel, utveckla AI-modeller, samt webblösningar för både klient- och serversidan. Du ska också ha dokumenterad erfarenhet av forskning och vetenskapliga publikationer.
   

  

 Dessutom är god samarbetsförmåga ett krav, liksom mycket god svenska i tal och skrift, eftersom kommunikation med slutanvändare i regel sker på svenska. Erfarenhet av professionellt arbete med projektets centrala teknikområden (Unity, ML-Agents, C# och Python, eller motsvarande) är starkt meriterande.
   

  

 Om anställningen
   

  

 Anställningen avser heltid och är tidsbegränsad till fem månader. Möjlighet till deltidsanställning kan diskuteras. Stockholms universitet tillämpar individuell lönesättning. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder
   

  

 Hos oss får du dynamiken i samspelet mellan högre utbildning och forskning som gör Stockholms universitet till en spännande och kreativ miljö. Du arbetar i en internationell miljö och får förmånliga villkor. Universitetet ligger beläget i Nationalstadsparken med goda förbindelser till city. Psykologiska institutionen bedriver sin verksamhet på campus Albano.
   

  

 Stockholms universitet värnar om att vara en arbetsplats som är fri från diskriminering och ger lika rättigheter och möjligheter för alla.
   

  

 Kontakt
   

  

 Ytterligare information lämnas av docent Johan Lundin Kleberg, johan.lundin.kleberg@su.se, tfn 08-163866.
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Du söker anställningen via Stockholms universitets rekryteringssystem. Du som sökande ansvarar för att ansökan är komplett och att den är universitetet tillhanda senast sista ansökningsdag.
   

  

 Anvisningar för sökande finns på webbsidan: att söka en anställning.
   

  

 Stockholms universitet bidrar till det hållbara demokratiska samhällets utveckling genom kunskap, upplysning och sanningssökande.
   

  

 Anställningsform: tidsbegränsad anställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100 % | Ort: Stockholm | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: SU FV-2196-25 | Facklig företrädare: ST/OFR st@st.su.se, Saco-S saco@saco.su.se, Seko seko@seko.su.se, | Publicerat: 2025-05-27 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-06-13

title: Business Developer - Swedish Speaking
description:
**Business Developer – Leyton Sverige**
**Om Leyton Sweden:** 
 Leyton Sverige är en del av Leyton Group och etablerades 2021 i Sverige. Vi är specialiserade på att hjälpa innovativa och tillverkande företag att få tillgång till finansiering för att utveckla sina verksamheter och behålla sin konkurrenskraft. Genom våra högkvalitativa finansiella konsulttjänster gör vi en verklig skillnad för både våra kunder och Sveriges ekonomi.
   

  

**Vad gör vi?** 
 På Leyton hjälper vi företag att optimera sina kostnader och öka sina besparingar genom innovativa finansiella lösningar. Våra tjänster är anpassade för att stödja deras tillväxt och utveckling. Med vår unika success fee -modell betalar kunden endast om de faktiskt gör extra besparingar. Vi tar inga förskottsavgifter eller kräver att budgetar ska planeras i förväg – vårt mål är att alla potentiella kunder ska kunna ta del av våra tjänster utan risk.
   

  

**Vad innebär rollen som Business Developer?**
 Som Business Developer hos oss har du en nyckelroll i att driva företagets tillväxt. Du kommer att:
   

  

* Ringa och boka möten med C-level-chefer inom en rad olika branscher.
* Delta i möten och kvalificera potentiella kunder.
* Stänga affärer och skapa långvariga kundrelationer.
* Ansvara för att hålla CRM-systemet uppdaterat.


**Vi Söker Dig Som**
* Är driven av att nå mål och överträffa förväntningar.
* Trivs med att arbeta i en prestationsbaserad miljö där du har stor påverkan på din egen lön.
* Har en stark vilja att utvecklas och bli den bästa versionen av dig själv.
* Gillar utmaningar och att kliva utanför din komfortzon.
* Är nyfiken och vill vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa.


**Varför ska du inte söka denna tjänst?**
* Om du ogillar att arbeta mot uppsatta mål och deadlines.
* Om du inte är intresserad av att utvecklas och ta till dig feedback.
* Om du föredrar en statisk arbetsmiljö och vill hålla dig inom din komfortzon.


**Varför ska du söka denna tjänst?**
* Om du vill sälja en tjänst som verkligen gör skillnad för företag och samhället.
* Om du tror att det är enkelt att sälja tjänster som i praktiken är "gratis" för kunden.
* Om du älskar känslan av att skriva under avtal och stänga affärer.
* Om du vill utveckla dina försäljningsfärdigheter och få direkt påverkan på din lön genom en attraktiv provisionsmodell utan tak.


**Vad Vi Erbjuder**
* En dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du får möjlighet att växa.
* En attraktiv provisionsmodell utan tak.
* Stora utvecklingsmöjligheter inom försäljning och affärsutveckling.
* Möjligheten att påverka både företagets och din egen framgång.
* Teamkänsla där du är en del av ett företag som uppskattar och belönar dina prestationer.
* 30 dagars semester, privat sjukvårdsförsäkring och pensionsförmåner.


**Är du redo för nästa steg i din karriär? Sluta läsa och kom väx med oss!**
